TopicTitle: Effects of destruction of specific parts of the launch pad or wider KSC facilities?

Articles.Content:
Below you see the rubble remnants of some kind of storage tanks at the launchpad, presumably cause by a falling rocket booster; I didn't see it happen. What are the effects of this on KSC operations? Does it affect launches in any way or is it purely cosmetic? If there are specific effects, do they vary for other components of the KSC infrastructure and is there a list of these somewhere?

Ignore the lander on the launchpad; I just needed to load something there to take the screenshot.

Edited June 7, 2016 by THX1138
Hmmm. It affects your ability to upgrade that facility, but your pad is already at tier 3. I think for the tier 3 launchpad it's just cosmetic, unless it's the pad itself.
